Vigilance
[i]Vow of Friendship[/i] – Whenever you make a choice, put a +1/+1 counter on Silas, Loyal Knight.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Silas, attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Silas and that creature gain deathtouch until end of turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {W}{B}
